includedVoiceCall.description: The amount of voice calls provided by the plan
includedVoiceCall.title: Includedvoicecall

includedVideoOrValueAddedCall.description: The amount of video calls(영상통화) or added calls(부가통화) provided by the plan
includedVideoOrValueAddedCall.title: Includedvideoorvalueaddedcall

includedVoiceCallTospecifiedNumbers.description: The amount of voice calls to specified numbers (지정통화) provided by the plan
includedVoiceCallTospecifiedNumbers.title: Includedvoicecalltospecifiednumbers

includedData.description: The amount of data. Generally GB units are used.
includedData.title: Includeddata

includedDataForSharingAndTethering.description: The amount of sharing and tethering data.
includedDataForSharingAndTethering.title: Includeddataforsharingandtethering

optionData.description: data provided in addition to the basic data provided
optionData.title: Optiondata

maximumAmountForSharing.description: The maximum amount of data that can be shared with others
maximumAmountForSharing.title: Maximumamountforsharing

monthlyPrice.description: amount of monthly price. KRW(원) units are used.
monthlyPrice.title: Monthlyprice

dataQoS.description: Speed control when you can continue to use data without additional charges after your default data limit has been used up
dataQoS.title: Dataqos

lineup.description: The name of the parent group to which the mobile plan belongs
lineup.title: Lineup

onboardingChannel.description: Channel to subscribe to the product
onboardingChannel.title: Onboardingchannel

onboardingDevice.description: device for subscribing to the product
onboardingDevice.title: Onboardingdevice

onboardingDeviceAlias.description: alias of device for subscribing to the product
onboardingDeviceAlias.title: Onboardingdevicealias

specialCustomerOnboard.description: Customer type segment (military, college student, etc.)
specialCustomerOnboard.title: Specialcustomeronboard

plan.description: SKTelecom mobile plan you want to change.
